Reviews.Title: cubot p9 phone
Reviews.Author: jenn
Reviews.Content: The size of the phone is good - as I wanted.I have had it  less then a month I think and it has stopped working when I makephone calls.The screen light does not come on when pushed, so I am unableto input any required numbers for extensions. It sometimes flickers on for onesecond and then goes "black" again.There are no details of how to delete previous phone calls made and so havingpages of unnecessary numbers cluttering up phone.I need to return this phone.

Reviews.Title: cubot p9
Reviews.Author: sena
Reviews.Content: waste of hard earned money, this cell phone worked for less than a month, and then the white screen of death, the phone does nothing just lights up and shuts back down, very disappointed stay away from this phone unless you have money to give away freely,

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Ravhat"
Reviews.Content: Purchased this phone as my first smart phone. Have had it for 1 day and have messed around with it most of the day. The call clarity seems to be good, but as for use as a tablet I notices some web pages didnt work correctly, couldn't watch netflix on it for some reason, the movie would start to play but the video would freeze about 3 sec. into the movie and the audio would keep playing as it should....weird. I could forgive the issues I just covered because I'm not going to watch movies or surf the web to much on it anyways but 2 things I can't push aside is the horrible viewing angles and the not so good cameras with weak flash. But I guess thats what the difference is between a $124.00 phone and a $600.00 one. I will keep it for a couple more days and play with it but this might be going back to the store.Update: March 7, 2014  Phone screen became very inaccurate, and most of the time unresponsive, attempting to return to seller.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: George Turner
Reviews.Content: These phones are awesome, especially for the price. I have not seen any phone of this quality for this price.

Reviews.Title: nice phone
Reviews.Author: Temeka Johnson
Reviews.Content: Good phone, battery last long, but lacking the freedom of a galaxy. I would buy it again. Thanks to the company

Reviews.Title: I'm happy with my purchase !
Reviews.Author: Alejandro
Reviews.Content: The cellphone exceeded my expectations and now i'm about to see how it works. I will recommend this product as much people as i can.

Reviews.Title: great touchscreen
Reviews.Author: Chantele Belamour
Reviews.Content: So far this phone has worked great, decent price for a phone of its quality with all of its features, shipping time was reasonable and arrived within expected window.

Reviews.Title: works good
Reviews.Author: adam
Reviews.Content: dose what it saids good phone and if you love samsung line of phones you will like one hey i only was paying for names mostly

Reviews.Title: Love those looks
Reviews.Author: Trinkrazo
Reviews.Content: Many people have stopped me in the break room and asked about my phone.  I get to tell them it is a knockoff of a samsung s5 and it ROCKS.  All the perks with out the price.  Only complaint is the speaker when on a call, really soft but the call speaker is loud so what ever.  Love the fact that the phone is so easy to use and so perfect for my library app.  Just love this phone.

Reviews.Title: Good phone
Reviews.Author: Liana S.
Reviews.Content: The cubot p9 is a great phone for the price, it is well made and works spectacularly the only. Downside is that I did not revive my promised. Free flip cover.

Reviews.Title: Its an ok phone for the price.
Reviews.Author: Oscar Garcia
Reviews.Content: The phone has a large screen,but the viewing angles are poor.In the sun it is very hard to see the screen. Camera is a little below average and the led flash is not very bright.It is slow, but if you are mainly interested in making phone calls and texting it is adequate. It will play most games on the play store.It has no compass,navigation is about useless,the gps takes forever to lock on.  The built in FM radio is sketchy.The call quality is fair.I say it is a buy if you are the type of person that needs a phone that will do most everything but not as well as the more familiar big phone makers.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: themeca irving
Reviews.Content: I love this phone I buy it for my sis and one of my friend it works just like the s4 phone

ProductInfo.Features:
5.0 inch large capacitive screen with 960*540 pixels QHD screen resolution
Support 3G: WCDMA 850/2100MHz ;2G: GSM 850/900/1800/1900MHz
Android 4.2 with 1.2GHZ MTK6572W Cortex-A7 Dual-core processor and 512MB RAM + 4GB ROM
8.0M Pixels High definition back camera with Auto Focus and flashlight, front 2.0M camera Light sensor, Gravity Sensor, Proximity sensor
Supports Android Navigation, built-in GPS navigation with A-GPS assisted, makes the positioning swiftly and accurately
ProductInfo.Name: Cubot P9 Unlocked 5.0 Inch QHD Screen 3G Dual Core Cell phone Dual SIM Dual Standby Android 4.2 1.2GHz MTK6572W Smartphone (White)
